item.title: Discord's Telemetry on WebSocket Connect
item.description: Intro Discord uses a WebSocket for communication between their servers and it’s web client. I decided to look into it to see if it has any telemetry with their desktop client (even a tiny amount); it does. The WebSocket WebSocket Intro WebSockets are great for using low bandwidth / data and fast communication, as it is event-driven and can easily support compressed and small messages. They are primarily used in the web, but can also be used server-side for some things.
